content: संतानः --नं {@--1@} Stretching, extending, extension, expanse, spread; <ls>Ś. 7. 8.</ls> {@--2@} Continuity, continuous flow or line, succession, continuance; अच्छिन्नामलसंतानाः <ls>Ku. 6. 69</ls>; संतानवाहीनि दुःखानि <ls>U. 4. 8.</ls> {@--3@} Family, race. {@--4@} Progeny, offspring, issue; संतानार्थाय विधये <ls>R. 1. 34</ls>; संतानकामाय राज्ञे <ls n="R.">2. 65</ls>, <ls n="R.">18. 52.</ls> {@--5@} One of the five trees of Indra's paradise.
